articles.title: Kim Jong Il Visits Kosan Fruit Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Visits Kosan Fruit Farm
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the Kosan Fruit Farm.
					 After being briefed on the farm before its map on prospective plan, he went round different parts of the farm including a newly-built orchard to acquaint himself in detail with the modernization of orchard and fruit production.
					
					 He gave a high appreciation of the fact that the party members and other working people of the farm created the orchard of 700 hectares, finished the construction of network of its facilities and dwelling houses for several dozens of households and the building of nursery on an expansion basis and did a lot of other work in one year.
					
					 Stressing the need to further develop pomiculture so as to provide the people with much more fruit, he advanced highly important tasks to be carried out by the farm.
					
					 The development prospect of the Kosan Fruit Farm located in good place is very rosy as it has favorable physiographical conditions for pomiculture, he said, indicating the orientation and ways for turning the farm into a modern and large-size fruit farm.
					
					 Saying that the farm should be renewed on a modern basis in keeping with the requirements of the new century in order to bring about a radical turn in fruit production, he underlined the need to conduct on a large scale its overall reclamation project ranging from basic construction to rearrangement of orchard and establishment of irrigation system according to a scientific long-term plan.
					
					 He said that measures for storing and processing fruits should be taken in a foresighted manner to supply fruits to the people without any waste since the output of fruits will considerably increase on the farm in a few years.
					
					 Nationwide and all-people efforts should be directed to the development of pomiculture to consolidate the already achieved successes and further expand them, he stressed.
					
					 He said that the development of pomiculture would be conducive to further improving the people's diet, promoting their health and rapidly developing the foodstuff industry as well as sprucing up the country more beautifully.
					
					 The development of pomiculture is one of the important undertakings for the people's everlasting prosperity, he said, earnestly calling for sustained efforts to this work to hand down to the posterity the better socialist paradise.
					
					 Noting that the role of the Kosan Fruit Farm is of very importance in supplying much more fruit to the people, he expressed great expectation and firm belief that the farm would effect a fresh turn in fruit production.
					
					 Accompanying him were Secretary Kim Ki Nam and department directors Jang Song Thaek and Pak Nam Gi of the WPK Central Committee and Generals of the Korean People's Army Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Guides Creation of Opera "Evgeni Onegin"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Guides Creation of Opera "Evgeni Onegin"
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave guidance to the creation of opera "Evgeni Onegin".
					 After learning about the creation of "Evgeni Onegin", he watched the opera under creation.
					
					 Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory is recreating the Russian opera "Evgeni Onegin", which was staged in 1958 by it, in keeping with the demand of the new century in hearty response to the instruction of Kim Jong Il to depict the national classics as well as world's famous masterpieces.
					
					 Kim Jong Il highly praised the creative success made by the teaching staff and students of the conservatory, expressing great satisfaction over the fact that they have produced the admirable opera of high artistic value perfectly meeting the requirements of the original work by devoting all their creative wisdom and enthusiasm.
					
					 Noting that the opera, created in a brief span of time, ensures all its aspects on a high artistic level, he said that the success made by the conservatory goes to prove that a remarkable creative upswing can be brought when the innovative discernment in the 21st century is combined with the creative mode and work-style dating back to the 1970s.
					
					 It is high admirable that young students have had abilities to produce any foreign opera, he said, adding that this proud achievement is a vivid manifestation of the validity and vitality of the WPK's policy of training artiste reserves.
					
					 He stressed that the Korean people, who have the world-famous cultural assets such as the five revolutionary operas and proudly advance toward the world with high pride and self-confidence of being a soon-to-be great prosperous and powerful nation, should get better understanding of the world culture.
					
					 Accompanying him were Secretary Kim Ki Nam and department directors Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek and Choe Ik Gyu of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: All Koreans Called upon to Struggle for Establishing Sovereignty
articles.content:
All Koreans Called upon to Struggle for Establishing Sovereignty
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- The establishment of sovereignty provides a sure guarantee for the existence and development of a nation.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 The struggle to achieve the national sovereignty is accompanied by an acute confrontation with the reactionary forces standing in its way, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The imperialists are keen to hold in check the struggle of each country and nation to establish sovereignty. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are apt to invent absurd pretexts for interfering in the internal affairs of other countries and do not hesitate to commit even military invasion against sovereign states in disregard of international law.
					
					 The spearhead of their aggression to deprive other countries of their sovereignty is directed to the DPRK, a bulwark for defending independence from imperialism.
					
					 Under the situation where the U.S. is posing constant nuclear threat to the DPRK after openly designating it as a target of its nuclear attack, it is entirely just for it to bolster up its nuclear deterrent for self-defence in every way under the banner of Songun and as to do so is a sovereign right and an essential requirement of the times and the nation for protecting the destiny of the nation.
					
					 The U.S. is now scheming to deprive the DPRK of its right to develop outer space and use it for peaceful purposes. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are now persistently kicking up an anti-DPRK campaign, vociferating about the nonsensical "abduction issue" and "missile launch" while shelving their past crimes.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak conservative regime in south Korea is zealously joining its U.S. and Japanese masters in their anti-DPRK campaign after singling out the confrontation with fellow countrymen as a policy, bereft of even the slightest intention of valuing the sovereignty and dignity of the nation. 
					
					 The reality requires all Koreans who love the country and the nation to intensify the struggle for smashing the moves of the reactionary forces at home and abroad and establishing the national sovereignty. The age-old desire of the Korean compatriots is sure to come true only when all of them turn out as one in the above-said nationwide struggle and display ardent patriotism in it, concludes the article.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Human Rights Abuses Chided
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Human Rights Abuses Chided
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Amnesty International at a meet-the press held in Seoul on June 2 denounced the south Korean puppet authorities for their human rights abuses.
					 AI accused the south Korean authorities of banning rallies and demos after labeling 1 842 political parties and civic and public organizations as "organizations spearheading illegal violent demonstrations" for the reason that they participated in the protests against the American beef import.
					
					 Last year AI warned against the south Korean police's merciless use of force, but no measure has been taken yet, AI deplored and went on:
					
					 Freedom of expression should be fully guaranteed as it is the basic right of the people. The Lee Myung Bak regime's ever more undisguised suppression of media persons these days is an infringement upon the freedom of speech. 
					
					 The suppression is now being intensified on the strength of the "National Security Law" under the Lee Myung Bak regime and, consequently, members of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration and the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification were arrested. This fact goes to prove the injustice of the evil law.
					
					 In order to put an end to police violence those who are responsible for it should be punished and the "government", in particular, should be held wholly accountable for it.
					
					 AI demanded the south Korean authorities thoroughly probe the truth behind the killing of evacuees in Ryongsan and severely punish those involved in the murder and take measures against the recurrence of the tragedy.

articles.title: Movement of S. Korean University Professors Unabated
articles.content:
Movement of S. Korean University Professors Unabated
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Professors of south Korean universities unanimously launched a movement for issuing declarations on the situation in protest against the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' unpopular and undemocratic rule.
					 This movement kicked off with the publication of the declaration on the situation by at least 120 professors of Seoul University on June 3 is now rapidly spreading to universities across south Korea.
					
					 Professors of Chungang University staged a protest against the Lee regime's unpopular rule on June 3 and those of Silla and Gyeongsang universities on June 4.
					
					 On June 5 those of universities in 17 areas of Taegu and North Kyongsang Province including Kyongbuk, Yeongnam, Kyeimyung and Daegu universities made public a declaration on the situation in the joint name of professors of universities in Taegu and North Kyongsang Pronvince desirous of democracy.
					
					 Recalling that millions of people have turned out in streets in protest against the Lee "government" as it is keen to maintain and boost its "power" through dictatorship and fascist suppression, the declaration said, holding that this is an inevitable result of Lee's dictatorial policy.
					
					 On the same day professors and lecturers of Chungbuk University and professors of Kyungnam University in a declaration on the situation demanded the guarantee of freedom of speech, assembly and conscience.
					
					 University professors in Pusan and Taejon and South Chungchong Province expressed their will to separately release declarations on the situation urging the Lee "government" to make apology for the failure of "its state administration" and guarantee freedom of assembly, demonstration and speech. 
					
					 Professors of Sungkyunkwan and Dongguk universities and universities in South Jolla Province declared they would join in the above-said movement and those of Korea University, in particular, are staging a signature campaign after drafting the above-said declaration.
					
					 In another development, opposition parties, civic and social organizations, religionists, university students and people of other strata are extensively waging the similar movement.

articles.title: Group of Traitors' Reckless Act to Tide over Its Ruling Crisis Ridiculed
articles.content:
Group of Traitors' Reckless Act to Tide over Its Ruling Crisis Ridiculed
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Solidarity for Progress called a press conference in Seoul on June 4 at which it denounced the puppet Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its reckless act to get rid of a tight corner.
					 The organization accused the Lee "government" of deliberately stoking and inciting social uneasiness by opening to the public scenes showing exercise of an assault of F-15K under the simulated conditions of coping with "a military clash in the waters of the West Sea," etc. in the wake of the announcement of its dangerous full participation in the PSI which may spark off a military conflict between the south and the north.
					
					 This is clear evidence proving that the authorities are leaving no means untried to attain their political aims, it held.
					
					 Noting that the authorities are working hard to shift the responsibility for the present situation onto the north in a bid to get rid of the crisis created by their treacherous and undemocratic rule, the organization declared that the Lee "government" is wholly to blame for having rendered the situation on the Korean Peninsula tense.
					
					 It urged the authorities to stop their folly and lift sanctions against the DPRK as they would escalate the military tensions on this land.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' North-Targeted War Exercises Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' North-Targeted War Exercises Blasted
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- The "Metropolitan Motorized Infantry Division" of the south Korean puppet army frantically staged air-ground joint military exercises under the simulated conditions of invasion of the north in a military drill ground in Phochon, Kyonggi Province, on June 4, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 Involved in it were latest war equipment including KF-16 fighters, AH-1S assault helicopters, K-1 A-I tanks, armored cars and self-propelled artillery pieces. They were busy with the exercise for occupying positions, frantically firing missiles and machine gun bullets and shells in the air and on the ground.

articles.title: June 15 Joint Declaration Supported by Bangladeshi Figure
articles.content:
June 15 Joint Declaration Supported by Bangladeshi Figure
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Kamal Hyder, secretary general of the Bangladesh Peace Council, issued a statement titled "It Is a Way of Ensuring Peace and Security on the Korean Peninsula to Implement the June 15 Joint Declaration" on June 1 on the occasion of the 9th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The statement said that the June 15 joint declaration is a great programme for reunification of Korea as it indicates main principles and ways for achieving national reconciliation, unity and reunification.
					
					 This year the DPRK called for reenergizing the national reunification movement under the slogan "Advance dynamically along the road of independent reunification under the banner of the June 15 Joint Declaration and the October 4 Declaration," the statement noted.
					
					 The statement expressed hope that the Korean nation would surely achieve the independent and peaceful reunification under the banner of the June 15 Joint Declaration.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Observed in Guinea
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Observed in Guinea
Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Lectures were held at the Guinea－Korea Friendship Association, the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science and the National Museum of Guinea on May 27 and 29 on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Banou Keita, chairman of the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association, said that the single-minded unity is the revolutionary philosophy of Kim Jong Il, adding it is thanks to him that the DPRK could win victory after victory in the revolution and construction by dint of the single-minded unity.
					
					  Malik Souma, director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science of Guinea, said that thanks to the Songun politics, the unique political mode of Kim Jong Il, the army in the DPRK has not only safeguarded the country's defence line as firm as an iron wall but also played the role of a pillar and a driving force of the revolution steering the overall cause of socialism and the political and ideological might of the whole society has grown strong incomparably on its basis. 
					
					 Riyad Chaloub, chief of the Guinean Group for the Study of February 16 Art, noted that the truth and vitality of the Songun idea, philosophy on army, are clearly proved in socialist Korea as it clarifies the philosophical principle that a strong army guarantees the sovereignty and independence of the country and the nation and the victory of socialism.
